name: OiLeak
description:
Oileak is a platformer game where you have to discover the world around you to reach the goal. Keep trying and see the tracks of your previous tries to keep progressing!

Composed by a total of 25 levels and different mechanics (jumps, traps, moving platforms, gravity changers...).

OiLeak is also available in the PlayStore!

Big thanks to Jannik Boysen for sharing the easy-releasy template to build this itch.io page!
